channel.title: Also looking for an Axoloti Core
channel.description:
Hello all,
I am also on the hunt for an elusive Axoloti. I have one already with an axo-control board on top, but I'm working on a new project that requires me to remove that board and I would much prefer to leave it on there and get a second Axoloti instead.
I'm UK based so let me know if any of you have one you'd be happy to ship to me and how much you'd want for it.
Thanks
P.S. still have my fingers crossed that Axoloti will come out of hibernation at some point. I love this platform.
